publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4768 Marlyn Glen: Long Walk for Peace—That the Parliament congratulates the participants in Scotland’s Long Walk for Peace on their efforts to draw both public and parliamentary attention to the costly and unnecessary replacement of the Trident weapons system; notes that the walkers will arrive at the Parliament on 19 September 2006 after covering the 85 miles from Faslane on foot in six days; considers that they should receive commendation from the Parliament for their hard work and dedication to this worthwhile cause; welcomes the walkers, and wishes them every success in their campaign. Supported by: Bill Butler*, Pauline McNeill*, Cathy Peattie*, Elaine Smith*, Kate Maclean*, Maureen Macmillan*, Mike Pringle*, Shiona Baird*, Patrick Harvie*, Campbell Martin*, Ms Maureen Watt*
S2M-4768 Long Walk for Peace (lodged on 8 September 2006) Bruce Crawford*, Eleanor Scott*, Brian Adam*, John Swinburne*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rob Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-4768 Long Walk for Peace (lodged on 8 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Colin Fox*
S2M-4768 Long Walk for Peace (lodged on 8 September 2006) Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-4768 Long Walk for Peace (lodged on 8 September 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
